key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and increased shipping costs
Dependence on the U.S. market, making it susceptible to regional economic downturns
Regulatory risks, particularly concerning emissions standards
High competition in the automotive aftermarket industry
controversies: Class action lawsuit alleging potential misconduct or misrepresentation
Legal dispute resulting in a $2 million disgorgement order
Open unfair labor practice case filed with the National Labor Relations Board
environmental_issues: Efforts to adapt to emissions compliance and develop eco-friendly solutions
social_issues: Unfair labor practices impacting employee relations and operational stability
governance_issues: Scrutiny of governance practices and adherence to the Code of Business Conduct and Ethics

sources.title: Case Law Update: Disputes Relating to Supply Chain Disruptions Hit the ...
